羬字的基本解释

羬
qián
六尺长的羊。
古代传说中一种似羊而长马尾的怪兽。

羬
xián
细角羚羊。

羬
yán
古书上说的一种大野羊。

羬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》巨淹切，平鹽，羣。］
(1)六尺的羊。
(2)见“羬羊”。

羬字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羊字部】　羬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页953第21
【廣韻】巨淹切【集韻】其淹切，?音箝。【爾雅·釋畜】羊六尺爲羬。【註】尸子曰：大羊爲羬，六尺。　又【玉篇】獸名。【山海經】錢來之山有獸焉。其狀如羊而馬尾，名曰羬羊，其脂可以已臘。　又【集韻】胡讒切，音咸。麙或从羊作羬。【類篇】山羊而大者，細角。　又魚咸切，音嵒。【類篇】郊羊，其大者羬?。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋獸】羊六尺爲羬。〕　謹照原書釋獸改釋畜。
羬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
羬字的起名意思

暂无。

羬
Basic explanation of words
羬
qián
Six feet long sheep.
In ancient legends, a monster with a pony tail resembling a sheep.
羬
xián
Small horned antelope.
羬
yán
A big wild sheep said in ancient books.
羬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" giant flooded cut, flat salt, group. ]
(1) Six-foot sheep.
(2) See "Yang Yang".
羬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Sheep Character Department] 　羬; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 953 No. 21
[Guang Yun] Ju Yan cut [Ji Yun] its drown cut, sound pliers. 【Erya·Shi Hu】The six feet of sheep are 羬. [Note] The corpse said: The big sheep is 羬, six feet.　[Jade articles] The name of the beast. [Shanhaijing] The mountain where money comes has beasts. It looks like a sheep with a horsetail, and its name is "Yan Yang", and its fat can be waxed.　[Jiyun] Hu slanderously cut, the sound is salty. Ye or from the sheep as the 纙. 【Classes】Goats and big ones, thin horns.　The fish is salted and cut, and the sound is rock. [Classes] Suburban sheep, which is the bigger one? Textual research: 〔【Erya·Shi Beast】The sheep six feet are 羬. 〕　I would like to change the release of the animal according to the original book.
